category-def.name: OCL2AC_With_Optimizer
category-def.label: OCL2AC With Optimizer
category-def.description:
OCL2AC: OCL2AC is a tool based on the Eclipse Modeling Framework (EMF) and consists of two main components: (1) OCL2NGC: translates OCL constraints into nested graph constraints. (2) NGC2AC: integrates graph constraints as guaranteeing application conditions into transformation rules. (2.1) (new) Optimizer for constructing optimized validity-preserving apllication conditions Each component can be used independently as an Eclipse-based tool.
Authors: Nebras Nassar et al. nassarn@mathematik.uni-marburg.de
